content:
Diagnosis:
Locally advanced esophageal squamous cell carcinoma, stage T4aN1M0 (AJCC 8th edition, Stage IVA)

Current situation:
Post cycle 3 cisplatin/5FU chemotherapy

MDT Discussion:
Case presented at Upper GI MDT on 15 April 2024

Imaging:
CT 10 April 2024 shows stable disease with primary tumor measuring 5.8cm (previously 6.0cm) with stable regional nodal disease. No distant metastases.

Clinical Update:
Performance status remains 1. Managing to maintain oral intake with pureed diet. Weight stable at 68kg.

MDT Recommendation:
Evidence of disease stability on current chemotherapy regimen. Plan to complete planned 6 cycles of cisplatin/5FU, then proceed to radical chemoradiotherapy if disease remains controlled.

Plan:
1. Continue with cycles 4-6 cisplatin/5FU
2. Repeat CT after cycle 6
3. Review in combined clinic with clinical oncology after completion of chemotherapy
4. Continue weekly dietetic support

Next appointment:
Pre-cycle 4 assessment in 2 weeks
